topics.body:
So I just played through RE 5
And I know that people have a problem with the game feeling so different from previous games, in terms of atmosphere and mood and all that

But honestly I think it fits
What I mean is, the original games were essentially cheesy, action/horror b-movies

And the current games are pretty much modern cheesy, action/horror b-movies

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5546bcb06368726608e80100#post_5546bcb06368726608e80100
[bq="mariomarc"]So I just played through RE 5
And I know that people have a problem with the game feeling so different from previous games, in terms of atmosphere and mood and all that

But honestly I think it fits
What I mean is, the original games were essentially cheesy, action/horror b-movies

And the current games are pretty much modern cheesy, action/horror b-movies[/bq]
The joke of RE is that it need to be a _survival horror_.
The original games were good in this genre, and there was less action and more suspense. Suspense and Survival Horror is what made the first three games awesome.

Since 4, RE games turned into a cheesy, action/horror b-movies, with unlimited ammo everywhere and no suspense, not giving you the chills that the first games had.

"@Background Pony #1340":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5546c558636872343aa90400#post_5546c558636872343aa90400
Oops log out.


"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5546c3416368722558d90700#post_5546c3416368722558d90700
I have a test tomorrow.
Not a big one, but is very important.
